japanese_title: 小オキキリムイが自ら歌った謡「この砂赤い赤い」
japanese_translation: (1) iwan poknashir......六つの地獄.地の下には六段の世界があってそこには種々な悪魔が住んでいます.
chinese_translation: iwan poknashir......六層地獄。 在地底下有六層，各種惡魔居住在那裡。
english_translation: (1) iwan poknashir......Six Hells. Beneath the earth, there are six levels, and various demons dwell there.
comment: Translated from English to Traditional Chinese, keeping the original meaning and using modern Chinese. Terms that are difficult to translate are kept in the original language.
